貞はる: (さだはる) - to harp too long on a subject
貞元: (ていげん) - Teigen era, Jougen era (976.7.13-978.11.29)
貞和: (ていわ) - Jouwa era (of the Northern Court) (1345.10.21-1350.2.27); Teiwa era

貞淑: (ていしゅく) - chastity; virtue; fidelity; feminine modesty
貞節を守る: (ていせつをまもる) - to keep one's chastity; to remain faithful to one's spouse; to remain faithful to one's lover

貞観時代: (じょうがんじだい) - Jougan period (of art history, 859-877 CE)

貞門: (ていもん) - Teimon school (of haikai, founded by Matsunaga Teitoku)
負い革: (おいかわ) - sling (e.g. of a firearm)
負う: (おう) - to bear/to carry on one's back; to take responsibility for/to accept a duty; to be injured; to owe

負える: (おえる) - to be able to bear; to be able to manage

負けぎらい: (まけぎらい) - hating to lose; always wanting to win; unyielding; competitive
負けじ魂: (まけじだましい) - unyielding spirit; indomitable spirit
負けずぎらい: (まけずぎらい) - hating to lose; unyielding; unbending; competitive; sore loser; determined

負けず嫌い: (まけずぎらい) - hating to lose; unyielding; unbending; competitive; sore loser; determined
負けないくらい: (まけないくらい) - as much as possible; unbeatably; unsurpassably
負けないぐらい: (まけないぐらい) - as much as possible; unbeatably; unsurpassably
負ける: (まける) - to lose/to be defeated; (負ける only) to succumb/to give in/to surrender/to yield; (負ける only) to be inferior to; (負ける only)  to break out in a rash due to (e.g. lacquer, shaving, etc.); (負ける only) to reduce the price/to lower the price/to give a discount on

負けん気: (まけんき) - competitive spirit; spirit of rivalry
負け嫌い: (まけぎらい) - hating to lose; always wanting to win; unyielding; competitive
負け得: (まけどく) - {sumo} loss of a low-ranked wrestler in the extra eighth bout in the tournament
負け惜しみ: (まけおしみ) - poor loser; make excuses; unwilling to admit defeat; sour grapes

負け投手: (まけとうしゅ) - (ant: 勝ち投手) losing pitcher

負け星: (まけぼし) - mark indicating a defeat

負け犬の遠吠え: (まけいぬのとおぼえ) - grumbling of a loser; loser's whining; sour grapes

負け越す: (まけこす) - to have more losses than wins

負の感情: (ふのかんじょう) - negative emotions; negative feelings

負の数: (ふのすう) - negative number; negative value
